description:
Basculin, known as the Hostile Pokémon, is a green and black colored fish. It has two forms which main difference is a colored stripe and the player encounters one form more commonly depending on the game version; red-striped Basculin are more common in Black, while the blue-striped variety is more common in White.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava praised its categorization as the "Hostile Pokémon", stating "Now here`s a category I can get behind". They criticized its abilities for contradicting each other.
name: Basslao
